sent.orig: When the onion leaves started to grow, we had the spring onion.
sent.trans: 当大葱长出葱叶时太好了，就剪了嫩嫩的叶来吃。

sent.orig: Heat oil in frying pan. Add garlic and onion and cook until onion is clear.
sent.trans: 用煎锅把油加热。放上蒜头和洋葱、直到到洋葱变透明。

sent.orig: Add the minced onion onion powder and garlic powder.
sent.trans: 加入洋葱碎，洋葱粉，蒜粉。

sent.orig: I will fry an onion to make onion rings.
sent.trans: 我将炒一头洋葱，做炸葱圈。

sent.orig: Seasoning and eggs silk, silk vegetables, minced meat and chopped green onion and so on.
sent.trans: 佐料有鸡蛋丝、丝菜、碎肉和葱花等。
